front.title: MPLS Transport Profile lock Instruct and Loopback Functions

abstract.t: This document specifies one function and describes a second function which are applicable to MPLS transport networks. The first function enables an operator to lock a transport path while the second enables an operator to set, in loopback, a given node along a transport path. This document also defines the extension to MPLS operation, administration, and maintenance (OAM) to perform the lock function. This document updates RFC 6371 section 7.1.1.
